column4: BRIEF-Microsoft tells possible Yahoo buyers it would consider backing bids with big bucks - Recode
column5: * Microsoft Has Made No Commitments So Far To Any Investors Regarding Yahoo And Any Discussions Now Are Exploratory -Recode

column4: Microsoft's AI Twitter bot goes dark after racist  sexist tweets
column5: Tay  Microsoft Corp's so-called chatbot that uses artificial intelligence to engage with millennials on Twitter  lasted less than a day before it was hobbled by a barrage of racist and sexist comments by Twitter users that it parroted back to them.

column4: Microsoft's AI Twitter bot goes dark after racist  sexist tweets
column5: March 24 Tay  Microsoft Corp's  so-called chatbot that uses artificial intelligence to engage with millennials on Twitter  lasted less than a day before it was hobbled by a barrage of racist and sexist comments by Twitter users that it parroted back to them.

column4: BRIEF-Mesosphere raises $73.5 million in series C funding
column5: * Closed $73.5 million in a series C funding round led by Hewlett Packard Enterprise  with Microsoft joining as a new strategic investor
